attributes.action: Freeze Fuel Prices / Taxation for 4 years
attributes.additional_details:
We, the public of the UK, would like a 4-year freeze on increase in price / taxation of Petrol and Diesel Fuel.

Due to the rise in inflation, which is not inline with wages, we the motorist's (Public) of the UK would like you to consider a freeze in the rise of fuel / Taxation for 4 years. If a freeze is not feasible, we request a drop in prices.

Our current fuel prices are £1.339 per litre for Petrol (average) and £1.399 per litre for Diesel (average), whereas in the USA - they currently charge the equivalent of £0.586 per litre of fuel, that is $0.928 per litre of Petrol. We are nearly 3 times the amount USA charge their motorists to fill up their vehicles.

More details on fuel prices throughout Europe and USA can be found here:
http://www.fuel-prices-europe.info/

Information stated in this e-petition is correct as of 15th November 2012.
